title: Drawing, "Textile Design: Small flowers on vine", ca. 1801
medium: Gouache and pencil on laid paper
dimensions:
Sheet: 22.9 x 27.9 cm (9 x 11 in.)
Image: 30.5 x 43.2 cm (12 x 17 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund
description: Yellow, pink and orange vines with pink tri-lobed flowers, white daisies with blue centers create a scattered pattern on dark brown ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design: Small flowers on vine", ca. 1801.
ca. 1801. Gouache and pencil on laid paper. Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund. 1957-46-1.
